name: returns
description: This table contains all returns (full carts or partial item returns).

columns.name: cart_id
columns.description: ID of a cart that a retuned item belongs to. In our E-commerce store users add items to a cart, then purchase the whole cart. Users are allowed to return as many items from a purchased cart as they want.

columns.name: item_id
columns.description: ID of an item that was returned.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when a return was processed.
